original_text: They set out from Elim, and all the congregation of the people of Israel came to the wilderness of Sin, which is between Elim and Sinai, on the fifteenth day of the second month after they had departed from the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중이 엘림에서 떠나 엘림과 시내 산 사이에 있는 신 광야에 이르니 애굽에서 나온 후 둘째 달 십오일이라

sentences.original_text: and all the congregation of the people of Israel came to the wilderness of Sin
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성의 온 회중이 신 광야에 이르렀으니

sentences.original_text: which is between Elim and Sinai
on the fifteenth day of the second month
after they had departed from the land of Egypt
